Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2013 04:20AM - edited Nov 21, 2013 04:22AM by JuanitaB diagnosed 1 week before my 54th birthday. I went through menopause at 40, was on HRT for 7 years. My mom passed from untreated breast cancer when she was 73, 20 years prior to my own dx.

I love your blog and I think you are an uber talented writer.
